sentences.sContent: It utilizes X-ray to make benchmark lead wire image simultaneously with the weld seam in computer.
sentences.sContent_eng: It utilizes X-ray to make benchmark lead wire image simultaneously with the weld seam in computer.
sentences.sCn: 射线使用于传递同步跟踪信息的基准铅丝与焊缝同时成像于计算机中。

trans.tranOther: a beam of radiation1 that can go through solid objects and is used for photographing the inside of the body
